languages.text: "Пустотное братство, чтоб вы знали, Лорд-капитан — это сборище из нескольких десятков пиратских команд в Просторе Коронус. Считают себя лучше обычных еретиков только лишь потому, что иногда ведут вокс-беседы с теми, кого собрались брать на абордаж. Моя воля — всадить бы им залп из макропушек, чтобы вся эта дрянь с палуб высыпалась, и поделом".

traits.locale_text: "Пустотное братство, чтоб вы знали, Лорд-капитан — это сборище из нескольких десятков пиратских команд в Просторе Коронус. Считают себя лучше обычных еретиков только лишь потому, что иногда ведут вокс-беседы с теми, кого собрались брать на абордаж. Моя воля — всадить бы им залп из макропушек, чтобы вся эта дрянь с палуб высыпалась, и поделом".

languages.text: "In case you are unaware, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a disorderly assembly of several dozen pirate factions in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Were it up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum loose from the decks. They certainly deserve it."
languages.original_text: "Пустотное братство, чтоб вы знали, Лорд-капитан — это сборище из нескольких десятков пиратских команд в Просторе Коронус. Считают себя лучше обычных еретиков только лишь потому, что иногда ведут вокс-беседы с теми, кого собрались брать на абордаж. Моя воля — всадить бы им залп из макропушек, чтобы вся эта дрянь с палуб высыпалась, и поделом".

traits.locale_text: "Just so you know, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a rag-tag gathering of several dozen pirate teams in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Had it been up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum out of the decks. They sure deserve it."

"Just so you know, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a rag-tag gathering of several dozen pirate teams in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Had it been up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum out of the decks. They sure deserve it."

"In case you are unaware, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a disorderly assembly of several dozen pirate factions in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Were it up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum loose from the decks. They certainly deserve it."

languages.text: « Au cas où vous l'ignoriez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, la Communauté du vide est un regroupement hétéroclite de dizaines de factions pirates opérant dans les Étendues de Koronus. À les entendre, ils valent mieux que les autres hérétiques au seul titre qu'il leur arrive d'envoyer un appel-vox aux victimes qu'ils s'apprêtent à aborder. Si ça ne tenait qu'à moi, je balaierais cette vermine d'une bonne salve de macro-canons, et sans sommation. C'est là tout ce qu'ils méritent. »
languages.original_text: "In case you are unaware, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a disorderly assembly of several dozen pirate factions in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Were it up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum loose from the decks. They certainly deserve it."

traits.locale_text: « Au cas où vous l'ignoriez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, la Communauté du vide est un regroupement hétéroclite de dizaines de factions pirates opérant dans les Étendues de Koronus. À les entendre, ils valent mieux que les autres hérétiques au seul titre qu'il leur arrive d'envoyer un appel-vox aux victimes qu'ils s'apprêtent à aborder. Si ça ne tenait qu'à moi, je balaierais cette vermine d'une bonne salve de macro-canons, et sans sommation. C'est là tout ce qu'ils méritent. »

languages.text: "Falls es Euch nicht bewusst ist, Lord Captain, die Gefährten der Leere sind eine unorganisierte Ansammlung mehrerer Dutzend Piratenfraktionen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. In ihren Augen stehen sie über regulären Ketzern, weil sie gelegentlich Vox-Konversationen mit den Schiffen führen, die sie gleich zu entern gedenken. Ging es nach mir, würde ich sie eine Salve aus der Makrokanone fressen lassen, um den Abschaum vom Deck zu schütteln. Verdient haben sie es allemal."
languages.original_text: "In case you are unaware, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a disorderly assembly of several dozen pirate factions in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Were it up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum loose from the decks. They certainly deserve it."

traits.locale_text: "Falls es Euch nicht bewusst ist, Lord Captain, die Gefährten der Leere sind eine unorganisierte Ansammlung mehrerer Dutzend Piratenfraktionen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. In ihren Augen stehen sie über regulären Ketzern, weil sie gelegentlich Vox-Konversationen mit den Schiffen führen, die sie gleich zu entern gedenken. Ging es nach mir, würde ich sie eine Salve aus der Makrokanone fressen lassen, um den Abschaum vom Deck zu schütteln. Verdient haben sie es allemal."

languages.text: «Por si no lo sabe, Lord Capitán, la Hermandad del Vacío es una alianza desorganizada de varias docenas de facciones pirata de la Extensión de Koronus. Se consideran mejores que los herejes solo porque a veces tienen conversaciones por voco con las naves que están a punto de abordar. Si dependiera de mí, acabaría con esa escoria con un disparo de los macrocañones. Es lo que merecen».
languages.original_text: "In case you are unaware, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a disorderly assembly of several dozen pirate factions in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Were it up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum loose from the decks. They certainly deserve it."

traits.locale_text: «Por si no lo sabe, Lord Capitán, la Hermandad del Vacío es una alianza desorganizada de varias docenas de facciones pirata de la Extensión de Koronus. Se consideran mejores que los herejes solo porque a veces tienen conversaciones por voco con las naves que están a punto de abordar. Si dependiera de mí, acabaría con esa escoria con un disparo de los macrocañones. Es lo que merecen».

languages.text: “船长老大，你有可能不知道，虚空协联是科罗努斯扩区几十个海盗拉帮结伙搞出来的帮派。他们认为自己比一般的异端分子高明，就因为他们有时候会先和目标通话，之后再突然把船开过去，冲到对面船上。要是我说了算的话，我会让他们尝尝宏炮齐射的滋味，把这群人渣彻底从甲板上轰飞。他们罪有应得。”
languages.original_text: "In case you are unaware, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a disorderly assembly of several dozen pirate factions in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Were it up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum loose from the decks. They certainly deserve it."

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，你有可能不知道，虚空协联是科罗努斯扩区几十个海盗拉帮结伙搞出来的帮派。他们认为自己比一般的异端分子高明，就因为他们有时候会先和目标通话，之后再突然把船开过去，冲到对面船上。要是我说了算的话，我会让他们尝尝宏炮齐射的滋味，把这群人渣彻底从甲板上轰飞。他们罪有应得。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン殿、ご存じないと思いますが、『虚空の仲間』はコロヌス・エクスパンスの数十の海賊派閥からなる無秩序な集団です。奴らが自らを普通の異端者よりも上だと考えているのは、奴らが間もなく乗り込もうとしている連中と時々ヴォクスで会話するからに他なりません。私でしたら、あのクズどもにマクロキャノンの一斉射撃を食らわせ、甲板から叩き出しますね。奴らには、それがお似合いです」
languages.original_text: "In case you are unaware, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a disorderly assembly of several dozen pirate factions in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Were it up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum loose from the decks. They certainly deserve it."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン殿、ご存じないと思いますが、『虚空の仲間』はコロヌス・エクスパンスの数十の海賊派閥からなる無秩序な集団です。奴らが自らを普通の異端者よりも上だと考えているのは、奴らが間もなく乗り込もうとしている連中と時々ヴォクスで会話するからに他なりません。私でしたら、あのクズどもにマクロキャノンの一斉射撃を食らわせ、甲板から叩き出しますね。奴らには、それがお似合いです」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, belki bilmiyor olabilirsiniz, Uçsuz Kardeşliği, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki onlarca korsan fraksiyondan oluşan düzensiz bir birlikteliktir. Kendilerini sıradan kâfirlerin üzerinde görürler çünkü bazen bordalamak üzere olduklarıyla voks üzerinden iletişim kurarlar. Bana kalsa onlara şöyle sağlam bir makro top salvosu yedirirdim ve pislikleri güvertelerinden uçururdum. Hak ettiklerine şüphe yok."
languages.original_text: "In case you are unaware, Lord Captain, the Fellowship of the Void is a disorderly assembly of several dozen pirate factions in the Koronus Expanse. They consider themselves above regular heretics solely because they sometimes have vox-conversations with those whom they are about to board. Were it up to me, I would make them eat a salvo from the macro-cannons to shake the scum loose from the decks. They certainly deserve it."
